title: CNN Gets Wrecked (Ep 1063)
description:
In this episode, I address the explosive CNN fake news story about a Russian spy. I also discuss two, anti-Trump media stories that were easily debunked after a basic internet search. Finally, I address the latest outrageous campaign proposal from this liberal politician and the continued liberal fight against Uber and Lyft.News Picks:Are Democrats going to the border to coach people on how to break our laws?

 

If you read the last section of this CNN article first, you’ll see it’s clearly more fake news. 

 

Rogue federal judges are destroying the federal judiciary.

 

Politifact butchers another “fact check.” 

 

The NRA fights back against San Francisco.

 

Why “intellectuals” continue to fall for socialism.

 

Copyright Dan Bongino All Rights Reserved.
